title: april 12: the start of the (first) american civil war [hosted by: dodie] (with St. Panther)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, dodie talks about the start of the American Civil War, digging into some of the political and societal conditions that led to the war’s onset and the effect the war had on the country at the time. Afterwards, she is joined by a special guest, St. Panther. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
